description.value:
A multi-hued array of scales covers a dragonprism staff, forming a gradient of color, and a dragon's claw holds a gem upon the staff's head. Dragons give allies these staves as a mark of esteem. While wielding a dragonprism staff you seem fiercer, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MPxbKoR54gkYkqLO]{Gouging Claw}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D7ZEhTNIDWDLC2J4]{Puff of Poison}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y6rAdMK6EFlV6U0t]{Breathe Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mv5L4201uk8hnAtD]{Reflective Scales}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kghwmH3tQjMIhdH1]{Summon Dragon}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mv5L4201uk8hnAtD]{Reflective Scales}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kghwmH3tQjMIhdH1]{Summon Dragon}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
